message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $12000 to us. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. For this exceptional item, I am proposing an initial offer of $15000. I look forward to your response.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on your product. However, based on my research and understanding of the market, I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12000 for the product.
